channel.title: Witchcraft: Real or Bullshit?
channel.description:
Do you guys believe in witchcraft? I'm in the 'I Don't Know' zone.
Here are some spells and 'information'. (I'm pretty sure these are bullshit.) :P
SIMPLE BLACK CANDLE ANTI-LOVE SPELL
Carve the taker's name and the words "GOOD BYE" on a black candle.
Dress it with Uncrossing oil. At its base place a broken or unlinked length of fine chain (you can find a broken length of bead chain at the bottom of the Uncrossing Oil i make and sell, or just break a piece of jewelry chain). Light the candle and as it burns, have a good cry and say "good bye." When the candle has burned about half-way, use its flame to set afire a photo or name-paper of the taker, then extinguish the candle in the ashes of the paper and throw the whole mess, broken chain and all, away at a crossroads in the dark of the night or bury it in a graveyard. Go home and bathe in astringent and pungent protective and mind-clearing herbs such as eucalyptus, walnut, bay, and the like (e.g. 13 Herb Bath) and get on with your life.
Good luck!
*==========================================================================* Sources of Energy
We live in a sea of energy. Everything around us is energy; we are energy. Matter is energy in a very tight, very specific matrix or form. Energy bombards us in various forms every day: light, sound, heat, radiation, gravity, ultraviolet light, microwaves, radio waves, television signals, and many, many others. All these forms of energy both include and make up the more subtle energy that we use in magick. This more subtle energy form has been called the "ether," or "aether," by some. Regardless of the name, it is a form of energy that interacts with, and possibly comprises, all other energy types.
The energy that is used in magick comes from six basic sources.
1.
The energy within ourselves 2.
The environment around us such as plants, rocks, nature, etc. 3.
Energy willingly given by others and/or energy created through various forms of personal empowerment 4.
Energy from other planes of existence: astral, mental, elemental, spiritual 5.
Energy from higher entities and divine sources. 6.
**From the pain/suffering/death of living beings.
** Use of this type of energy gathering is rare, yet powerful and usually comes with grave consequences. This type of energy is usually reserved for the darker, and more black aspects of magic.
Personal/Internal Energy
The physical body is a storehouse and channel for energy. The center of our energy system is our chakras. The chakras are energy transfer points within the body, and are responsible for regulating the energy field of the body. There are seven major chakras located along the spine, 21 minor chakras (two are located in the palms of the hand), and there are over 101 other energy points located across the body. The chakras help to regulate the flow of energy within the body and to form the auric bodies. The auric bodies are basically shells of energy which surround the body. This energy field is known as the aura; some people like to call it the Human Energy Field. More on this later.
The body stores energy for normal and magickal use. In addition, the body can channel energy from outside sources to replenish itself and for use in magick. People tend to have three types of internal energy:
o
Life essence o
Normal energy o
Magickal energy
The life essence is the core of our energy system. This energy is rarely tapped.
The normal energy of the body is that energy that is used in everyday life. It is the easiest energy to replace, and is replenished through eating, resting, exercise, and other activities designed to restore/maintain the body/mind.
Every individual possesses magickal energy to some extent. As with normal energy, magickal energy can be developed and its capacity increased. Magickal energy is the energy gathered from the energy that permeates all things. Magickal energy can be used to increase normal energy. Magickal energy can also be replaced through rest, as well as through several exercises that will be discussed throughout this course of study. *==========================================================================* -Your tongue flicks sharply as you lick the tip of your finger, checking the arcane signals in the air. Then slowly, you exhale while projecting out blood thirsty energy particles. You emit them from every direction - no one in close proximity is immune.
To the trained eye it would look as if your aura just grew 5 fold and was trying to compress 15 feet of energy back down into a 3 foot area!
To you it just feels like your blood has been set on fire, like you're oozing with new, fresh power. Use it as you will, but never abuse it - else your fate be sealed.-
Siphoning Strength like that found in the Vampiric Aura ability is much like absorbing energy from any other source. The advantage is however, it's usually MUCH easier to steal energy from another living being than it is a plant or animal. Due to humanistic properties of their specific energy, not much transition in vibration must be made with any type or energy exchange.
*==========================================================================*
[hr]
THE CHARGE OF JUPITER In request for a spell for the return of money owed one:
You will need: * Green candle *
Picture of person who owes money, to use if needed for visualization
The Projective Hand is the hand that is normally used for manual activities such as writing, peeling apples and dialing telephones is symbolically thought to be the point at which Personal Power is visualized as streaming from the body. In ritual, personal power is visualized streaming out of the palm or fingers of the hand for various magical goals. This is also the hand in which tools such as the Athame and wand are held. Ambidextrous persons simply chose which hand to utilize for this purpose. Hold the candle in your projective hand visualize the money re-manifesting in you life. Remember, never visualize the process of getting the money, visualize receiving the money from the one who owes it to you. Recite the following: I charge you by Jupiter, I charge you by the Earth, I charge you Sun, Moon, and Stars: Bring back my money to me, Prosperity. Money to me, Prosperity. Money to me, Prosperity. Place the candle in its holder. Light it. Sit or stand before it watching the flame transform the wax into a liquid. Visualize the candle releasing the energies that you've placed within it. Sense it sending out power to bring your ex for return of money into manifestation. Let the candle burn down to its end (if in a safe location). Or, allow it to burn for 4, 8, or 16 minutes daily until your need manifests.
*==========================================================================* What exactly is 'Magic' / 'Magick'?
Magic or magick is the process of causing change to occur by the application and direction of energy through the use of your Will. Many people add a "k" to magic to distinguish true magick from slight-of-hand and stage tricks.
Magick is a broad term given to the ability to make events occur in accordance with one's true Will by the application of sufficient energy.
In other words, magick is the direction of energy to a desired goal or purpose. It is a manipulation of the more subtle forms of energy which science is just beginning to understand.
Magic is a very general term which describes many branches or areas within it's self. For example, one could compare the broad term of magic to the broad term of medicine. In the medical field, there are various things someone can specialize in. Whether it be Cardiology, Pediatrics, or Surgeon just to name a few. Accordingly, there are many very different and specialized areas within magic, some include Elemental Magic, Sympathetic Magic, Herbalism, Aromatherapy, Healing, Shamanism and many others. One of these areas which is generally thought of as the spell casting area of magic is Witchcraft.
Witchcraft
Witchcraft is a branch of magic that also deals with healing, protection, fertility, curses, hexes and the likes. It is a branch of magic that is centered on techniques to improve the life of the practitioner and those around them. Those who practice Witchcraft or Wicca also tend to be of the Pagan religion, but this is not a requirement per' say.
Origins
The true origins of witchcraft are impossible to state. In it generally believe that Witchcraft had its origins in the beliefs of nature and animism held by primitive man during the Paleolithic era and earlier. The earliest humans were part of a hunter/gatherer society. To this level of culture, the things most important things to survival were the ability to find food (either through hunting or gathering from the land) and the reproduction of the species. *==========================================================================* Your eyes are powerful tools of power. By just directing your attention, and focusing your gaze you can instantly instill fear, intimidation, love etc. The power of the eye has been known for quite some time, and we're about to expose how you can become aware of this power, and begin using it to your advantage today!
To begin to develop a piercing gaze, you'll need practice in front of the mirror. Begin by staring at your self, eye ball to eye ball. Try to pierce yourself with your own concentration. Allow your mind to gentle seep into your own eyes and observe what flashes through 'your minds eye'. By increasing your awareness of this magical vision which appears in your head while fixing your gaze upon another's eyes - you begin to develop the Piercing Gaze.
A normal glance at someone is just that - a glance. A quick visual judgment of who they are, what mood they're in, what type of person they are likely to be etc. This are simple tasks for your brain to distinguish with just a normal glance.
However to know the secrets of that persons past, future and present you must develop the Piercing Gaze. After sufficient practice in front of the mirror at observing your minds eye images, you can begin to practice on other people.
Next time your in public, make it a goal to try to pry apart a persons outer visade' and take a shortcut into right into the depths of the their soul through their eyes.
"Eyes are the window's to your soul." - What a true statement this is. Not only are they windows, but they are Cannons as well - capable to blasting out sub- atomic energy which can instantly change the state of your intended target.
Now you know how to begin using the power of your eyes to decipher another person's soul secrets as well as instantly change their state by simply fixating your gaze on them and instilling a picture in your minds eye.
On a personal note, I've been doing this ability for quite some time now. Just the other day it had a phenomenal payout...
Our neighbors have a set of mean pit bulls. The kind of pit bulls that will eat your cat if it steps a foot in their yard. None the less, the larger of the two happened to get out of their backyard the other day.
Well about the same time he got out, I decided to go for a walk. About 20 feet in front of my house they dog spotted me and started to rush me like he was going to attack me! Now if you know anything about pit bulls, than you know being attacked by one is a very bad thing to say the least.
Despite the fact the dog was in the process of covering ground so he could maul my face - for some reason I didn't have a shred of fear in my entire body. I felt my blood pressure stay the same as I centered myself trying to keep my calm and coolness.
Well I could either turn around and run back to the house at this point, or stand my ground and face off with a pit bull. I knew there was no need to run, Men rule beasts and I was about to show him just that. With a snap of my wrist I held out my hand like I was halting traffic and fixed my gaze directly unto his showing him I was not afraid and was prepared to stand my ground and fight if need be.
He continued to charge at me like a locomotive, until finally he came within an arms reach from my hand - and then he stopped. He stopped dead in his tracks, turned around and ran away. Absolutely, positively a true story.
The dog went home, I went on about my walk. Using my gaze alone I was able to stop a attacking animal dead in it's tracks and go home. Now that's powerful magic.
*==========================================================================*
[hr] ANCIENT HINDU SPELL FOR INVISIBILITY
Lots of requests for [invisibility spells], so here's one I've just come across. It's from the Srividyaarnavatantra, a Tantric manuscript dealing mainly with Tripuraasundari (and with Kali and some other goddesses to a lesser degree) A process has been prescribed for making oneself invisible to others. With five wicks, one each made of the fibers of arka (Calatropis gigantea), shaalmali (Salmalia malabarica), kaarpaasa (Gossypium heraceum) [i.e. cotton], patta (cloth), pankaja (lotus) [dipped in] narataila (human oil i.e., oil extracted from a corpse) one should kindle five lights.
These should be placed, one by one, on five human skulls. Then the combined black ashes, obtained from the above lights, should be applied to the eyes while one is in a temple of Shiva. The ashes are first consecrated with the following mantra, recited 1008 times: Om hum phat kaali kaali mahaakaali maamsa-shonitam khaadaya khaadaya devi maa pasyatu manuseti hum phat svaahaa.
*==========================================================================* Put simply, if you are like 90% of the World's population, you've been tricked. If you are a part of one of the three biggest monotheistic religions in the world Judaism, Christianity or Islam - you've been the victim of a charade of symbolism taken literally to the point of a mass delusion.
You've been told that Heaven was a place that you go when you die if your good. Hell was of course the opposite. Angels were spirits that originated from Heaven and were servants or messengers of God. Demons originate from the darkest pits of Hell, and servants for the Devil. These were all things you were raised to believe; however, these concepts were taken WAY too seriously.
Now, the truth: Heaven and Hell are of the 'infernal' variety. What exactly does this mean? As referred to by most High Magick teachings, 'infernal' relates to the subconscious stratum of the human psyche. Spirits (Angles/Demons) inhabiting these regions would then be personifications of powers or energies that lie buried in our subconscious minds - qualities of our consciousness that we have disowned or forgotten....

item.title: Witchcraft: Real or Bullshit?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Explain how the earth came to be then - logically. Heres how man explains it:

First of all this big explosion happened. A big one.
From that, all of these atoms magically dispersed, and formed different elements.
Next, some clumps got together and made plannets - and some decided to be giant balls of burning gas.
One of these clumps mysteriously landed the EXACT right distance away from the sun in order to be able to support life.
Somehow, these atoms arranged themselves and created organic compounds.
They then continued to change until they made living things.
The living things then proceded to gain intelligence and eventually turned into humans.

Oh great - my great great^1000 grandfather was a rock. Cool.

Obviously you have never seen the miracle of life unfold before your eyes. Have you seen an egg hatch? A tadpole evolve into a frog?

Read full topic
